heading: HR00898
0: RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE DESIRED ECONOMIC POLICY DIRECTION OF THE PHILIPPINES WITH REGARD TO FOREIGN PARTICIPATION IN THE OWNERSHIP AND OPERATION OF CORPORATIONS AND FIRMS ENGAGED IN THE BUSINESS OF CONSTRUCTION OF BUILDINGS AND OTHER INFRASTRUCTURE IN THE PHILIPPINES
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00898
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE DESIRED ECONOMIC POLICY DIRECTION OF THE PHILIPPINES WITH REGARD TO FOREIGN PARTICIPATION IN THE OWNERSHIP AND OPERATION OF CORPORATIONS AND FIRMS ENGAGED IN THE BUSINESS OF CONSTRUCTION OF BUILDINGS AND OTHER INFRASTRUCTURE IN THE PHILIPPINES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : YAP, ARTHUR C.
DATE FILED : 2017-03-16
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-08-29
          -initial deliberation, other deliberations were held on 09-26-2017, 12-12-2017 and 01-16-2018.
      2. Committee Report approved on 2018-05-28
      3. Committee Report filed on 2018-11-28
          -Committee Report# 971, substituted by HR 2335
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON ECONOMIC AFFAIRS ON 2017-05-09
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-05-02;
REMARKS: In pursuant to House Resolution No. 898, House Resolution No. 2335 was reported out on November 28, 2018 under Committee Report No. 971
